Oops, forgot!

::Zardus::

Zardus turns around, looking at Lambda and Burning Hammer. "I see 
you've returned," he says to the Alliance bot, "There's a Maximal in 
the lower cargo bay, Burning Hammer, can you go and take care of him?"

He looks at Lambda, "Nice to meet you, Lambda. Did Burning Hammer 
already tell you about us?"

His comm recieves Gotron's message, silently replying. "Good work. I 
am just inside the entrance to the Iron Fist, please report to me 
with the new bot."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Lambda::
>     She is still standing there feeling rather foolish standing 
there being 
> ignored.  She opened her mouth and said "Hello.  Do..."  She 
thought better 
> of her last sentence but thought 'Do you want my help or not.'
